name: dashy
description: Dashy is a highly configurable self-hosted dashboard for organizing links, services, and status widgets. It supports themes, authentication, custom YAML config, and integrates seamlessly with homelab setups.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Group and categorize links and services. Perfect homelab dashboard

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Choose from multiple themes or create your own. Beautiful customization

features.title: Authentication
features.description: Secure access with built-in auth options. Protected dashboard

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete ownership of your dashboard. Privacy and independence
